column4:
Your Streamflix subscription is auto-renewing!
We raised prices again because shareholder expectations.
Binge-watch shows we'll cancel after one season. Now you get to pay full price for disappointment."

Your Pixney Plus subscription is renewing.
The mouse demands his tribute. Every month. Without fail.
Childhood memories hit different when money's tight. The nostalgia tax is real and it's expensive."

Your Soundify Premium is renewing.
Just the cost of 10 coffees! Or actual groceries.
Music is food for the soul
column5: your wallet disagrees. Can't skip bills though

column4:
Your Amazin Prime membership is renewing!
Remember when this was affordable? The price only goes up
column5: just like everything else.\nTwo-day shipping on regret and buyer's remorse. Math is fun!"

column4:
Your Hoolu subscription renews today.
Entertainment or savings? You'll pick entertainment every time.
Watch now
column5: worry about rent later. Streaming through financial anxiety since 2023."

column4:
Your KBO MAX subscription is renewing.
Premium content deserves premium prices! We keep raising them to prove it.
Watch rich people solve problems with money you don't have. Peak entertainment."

Your Pineapple Music subscription renews today.
Investing in vibes! Your savings account is crying but your playlist is immaculate.
Your playlists cost more than therapy would. At least the algorithm understands your feelings."

Your ViewTube Premium is renewing!
Who needs groceries when you can skip ads?
Your feed knows you better than your family. Background play enabled. Financial stability disabled."

Your PlaySphere Plus is renewing.
Can't put a price on fun! (It keeps going up though)
Your K/D ratio is great
column5: your credit score... not so much. Your backlog is impressive

column4:
Your Ybox Game Pass is renewing!
Best deal in gaming! Hundreds of games to distract you from checking your bank account.
Your gamerscore is higher than your savings balance. Achievement unlocked: Financial Irresponsibility!"

Your Chatter Nitro is renewing.
Inflation hits hard
column5: custom emojis hit different! Express yourself in high-res while your wallet expresses pain.\nServer boosts forever
column6: financial stability temporary. Your presence is premium
